title: veriable for connection (name, ip, other attributes)
author: hungrysnake
body_snippet:
I am looking for a solution to manage same connections structure but different locations using variable.

for example, i have 5 locations, hk, jp, us, uk, au.
i am thinking if it is possible to add a feature like variable to name and ip/fqdn.
name = {{country}}-gw1, sitecode=10
host = {{country}}-gw1.example.com
ip = 10.{{sitecode}}.0.1
could also apply to other attribute like port, username, password.
port = 300{{sitecode}}
username = {{country}}-admin
password = seacretpw-{{country}}...
